results.title: The Shawshank Redemption
results.overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

results.title: The Godfather
results.overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

results.title: The Dark Knight
results.overview: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

results.title: Schindler's List
results.overview: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis while they worked as slaves in his factory during World War II.

results.title: Pulp Fiction
results.overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

results.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
results.overview: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

results.title: Forrest Gump
results.overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

results.title: Fight Club
results.overview: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

results.title: Inception
results.overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

results.title: The Matrix
results.overview: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

results.title: Goodfellas
results.overview: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

results.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
results.overview: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

results.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
results.overview: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda.

results.title: Interstellar
results.overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

results.title: City of God
results.overview: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

results.title: Se7en
results.overview: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

results.title: Saving Private Ryan
results.overview: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

results.title: Spirited Away
results.overview: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

results.title: Parasite
results.overview: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

results.title: The Green Mile
results.overview: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

results.title: Fight Club
results.overview: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

results.title: Forrest Gump
results.overview: A man with a low IQ has accomplished great things in his life and been present during significant historic events—in each case, far exceeding what anyone imagined he could do.

results.title: Inception
results.overview: Cobb, a skilled thief who commits corporate espionage by infiltrating the subconscious of his targets, is offered a chance to have his criminal history erased as payment for the implantation of another person's idea into a target's subconscious.

results.title: The Matrix
results.overview: Set in the 22nd century, The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth.

results.title: Pulp Fiction
results.overview: A burger-loving hit man, his philosophical partner, a drug-addled gangster's moll and a washed-up boxer converge in this sprawling, comedic crime caper.

results.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
results.overview: Aragorn is revealed as the heir to the ancient kings as he, Gandalf and the other members of the broken fellowship struggle to save Gondor from Sauron's forces.

results.title: The Godfather: Part II
results.overview: In the continuing saga of the Corleone crime family, a young Vito Corleone grows up in Sicily and in 1910s New York. In the 1950s, Michael Corleone attempts to expand the family business into Las Vegas, Hollywood and Cuba.

results.title: Schindler's List
results.overview: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis while they worked as slaves in his factory during World War II.

results.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
results.overview: Young hobbit Frodo Baggins, after inheriting a mysterious ring from his uncle Bilbo, must leave his home in order to keep it from falling into the hands of its evil creator. Along the way, a fellowship is formed to protect the ringbearer and make sure that the ring arrives at its final destination: Mt. Doom, the only place where it can be destroyed.

results.title: Goodfellas
results.overview: A young man grows up in the mob and works very hard to advance himself through the ranks. He enjoys his life of money and luxury, but is oblivious to the horror that he causes. A drug addiction and a few mistakes ultimately unravel his climb to the top.

results.title: The Dark Knight
results.overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of Lieutenant Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague the city streets. The partnership proves to be effective, but they soon find themselves prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a rising criminal mastermind known to the terrified citizens of Gotham as The Joker.

results.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
results.overview: Frodo and Sam are trekking to Mordor to destroy the One Ring of Power while Gimli, Legolas, and Aragorn search for the orc-captured Merry and Pippin. All along, nefarious wizard Saruman awaits the Fellowship members at the Orthanc Tower in Isengard.

results.title: Interstellar
results.overview: Interstellar chronicles the adventures of a group of explorers who make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel and conquer the vast distances involved in an interstellar voyage.

results.title: Saving Private Ryan
results.overview: As U.S. troops storm the beaches of Normandy, three brothers lie dead on the battlefield, with a fourth trapped behind enemy lines. Ranger captain John Miller and seven men are tasked with penetrating German-held territory and bringing the boy home.

results.title: The Pianist
results.overview: The true story of pianist Władysław Szpilman's experiences in Warsaw during the Nazi occupation. When the Jews of the city find themselves forced into a ghetto, Szpilman finds work playing in a café; and when his family is deported in 1942, he stays behind, works for a while as a laborer, and eventually goes into hiding in the ruins of the war-torn city.

results.title: Gladiator
results.overview: In the year 180, the death of emperor Marcus Aurelius throws the Roman Empire into chaos. Maximus is one of the Roman army's most capable and trusted generals and a key advisor to the emperor. As Marcus' devious son Commodus ascends to the throne, Maximus is set to be executed. He escapes, but is captured by slave traders. Renamed Spaniard and forced to become a gladiator, Maximus must battle to the death with other men for the amusement of paying audiences.

results.title: American History X
results.overview: Derek Vineyard is paroled after serving 3 years in prison for brutally killing two black men who tried to break into/steal his truck. Through his brother, Danny Vineyard's narration, we learn that before going to prison, Derek was a skinhead and the leader of a violent white supremacist gang that committed acts of racial crime throughout L.A. and his actions greatly influenced Danny. Reformed and fresh out of prison, Derek severs contact with the gang and becomes determined to keep Danny from going down the same violent path as he did.

results.title: The Departed
results.overview: To take down South Boston's Irish Mafia, the police send in one of their own to infiltrate the underworld, not realizing the syndicate has done likewise in Martin Scorsese's multiple Oscar-winning crime thriller. While an undercover cop curries favor with the mob kingpin, a career criminal rises through the police ranks. But both sides soon discover there's a mole among them.

results.title: Schindler's List
results.overview: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis while they worked as slaves in his factory during World War II.

results.title: The Prestige
results.overview: A mysterious story of two magicians whose intense rivalry leads them on a life-long battle for supremacy — full of obsession, deceit and jealousy with dangerous and deadly consequences.

results.title: Inception
results.overview: Cobb, a skilled thief who commits corporate espionage by infiltrating the subconscious of his targets, is offered a chance to regain his old life as payment for a task considered to be impossible: 'inception', the implantation of another person's idea into a target's subconscious.

results.title: The Shawshank Redemption
results.overview: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden. During his long stretch in prison, Dufresne comes to be admired by the other inmates -- including an older prisoner named Red -- for his integrity and unquenchable sense of hope.

results.title: The Godfather
results.overview: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family. When organized crime family patriarch Vito Corleone barely survives an attempt on his life, his youngest son, Michael, steps in to take care of the would-be killers, launching a campaign of bloody revenge.

results.title: The Matrix
results.overview: Set in the 22nd century, The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth.

results.title: The Shawshank Redemption
results.overview: Tim Robbins portrays Andy Dufresne, a man sentenced to life in Shawshank prison for the murder of his wife, although he insists on his innocence. The movie explores the themes of hope, despair, and friendship as Andy makes his way through the brutality of prison life.

results.title: Inception
results.overview: Dom Cobb (played by Leonardo DiCaprio) is a skilled thief who specializes in entering people's dreams to steal their secrets. He is offered a chance at redemption by performing an impossible task: planting an idea in someone's mind.

results.title: The Social Network
results.overview: A gripping drama that chronicles the creation and rise of Facebook, focusing on the tumultuous relationship between its co-founders, Mark Zuckerberg and Eduardo Saverin.

results.title: Gravity
results.overview: Dr. Ryan Stone (Sandra Bullock) and astronaut Matt Kowalski (George Clooney) fight for survival after their space shuttle is destroyed, leaving them stranded in orbit.

results.title: Django Unchained
results.overview: Set in the pre-Civil War South, this Quentin Tarantino film follows the journey of a freed slave (Jamie Foxx) who teams up with a bounty hunter (Christoph Waltz) to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner (Leonardo DiCaprio).

results.title: Interstellar
results.overview: In a future where Earth faces environmental collapse, a group of astronauts embarks on a journey through a wormhole to find a new habitable planet for humanity.

results.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
results.overview: A quirky comedy-drama set in a fictional European hotel during the 1930s. The film follows the misadventures of the hotel's concierge and his loyal lobby boy.

results.title: Whiplash
results.overview: A talented young drummer (Miles Teller) enrolls in a prestigious music conservatory and faces the intense mentorship of a demanding jazz instructor (J.K. Simmons).

results.title: Gone Girl
results.overview: When his wife (Rosamund Pike) goes missing, Nick Dunne (Ben Affleck) becomes the prime suspect. The film explores deception, media frenzy, and the secrets of a troubled marriage.

results.title: Birdman
results.overview: A washed-up actor (Michael Keaton) famous for playing a superhero struggles to revive his career by staging a Broadway play. The film blurs the line between reality and fantasy.

results.title: Nightcrawler
results.overview: A freelance videographer (Jake Gyllenhaal) chases crime scenes in Los Angeles to capture shocking footage for the news. The film delves into the dark side of media sensationalism.

results.title: Boyhood
results.overview: Filmed over 12 years, this unique coming-of-age drama follows the life of a boy (Ellar Coltrane) as he grows from childhood to adulthood. A remarkable cinematic experiment.

results.title: Her
results.overview: Set in a near-future Los Angeles, a lonely man (Joaquin Phoenix) develops an emotional connection with an advanced artificial intelligence operating system (voiced by Scarlett Johansson).

results.title: The Imitation Game
results.overview: Based on the life of Alan Turing (Benedict Cumberbatch), a brilliant mathematician and codebreaker during World War II. The film explores his work on breaking the German Enigma code.

results.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
results.overview: A group of intergalactic misfits, including Star-Lord (Chris Pratt), Rocket Raccoon, and Groot, team up to save the galaxy from a powerful villain. A fun-filled space adventure.

results.title: The Theory of Everything
results.overview: A biographical drama about the life of physicist Stephen Hawking (Eddie Redmayne) and his relationship with his wife, Jane Wilde (Felicity Jones).

results.title: Edge of Tomorrow
results.overview: In a war against alien invaders, a soldier (Tom Cruise) gains the ability to relive the same day over and over. He teams up with a skilled warrior (Emily Blunt) to change the course of the battle.

results.title: Snowpiercer
results.overview: In a post-apocalyptic world, the remnants of humanity survive aboard a perpetually moving train. The class struggle intensifies as the passengers revolt against their oppressive rulers.

results.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
results.overview: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search of her homeland with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

results.title: The Revenant
results.overview: In the 1820s, a frontiersman, Hugh Glass, sets out on a path of vengeance against those who left him for dead after a bear mauling.

results.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
results.overview: Thirty years after defeating the Galactic Empire, Han Solo and his allies face a new threat from the evil Kylo Ren and his army of Stormtroopers.

results.title: The Martian
results.overview: During a manned mission to Mars, Astronaut Mark Watney is presumed dead after a fierce storm and left behind by his crew. But Watney has survived and finds himself stranded and alone on the hostile planet. With only meager supplies, he must draw upon his ingenuity, wit, and spirit to subsist and find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

results.title: Inside Out
results.overview: Growing up can be a bumpy road, and it's no exception for Riley, who is uprooted from her Midwest life when her father starts a new job in San Francisco. Like all of us, Riley is guided by her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust, and Sadness. The emotions live in Headquarters, the control center inside Riley's mind, where they help advise her through everyday life. As Riley and her emotions struggle to adjust to a new life in San Francisco, turmoil ensues in Headquarters. Although Joy, Riley's main and most important emotion, tries to keep things positive, the emotions conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

results.title: La La Land
results.overview: Mia, an aspiring actress, serves lattes to movie stars in between auditions, and Sebastian, a jazz musician, scrapes by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, but as success mounts, they are faced with decisions that begin to fray the fragile fabric of their love affair, and the dreams they worked so hard to maintain in each other threaten to rip them apart.

results.title: Doctor Strange
results.overview: After his career is destroyed, a brilliant but arrogant surgeon gets a new lease on life when a sorcerer takes him under her wing and trains him to defend the world against evil.

results.title: Deadpool
results.overview: Deadpool tells the origin story of former Special Forces operative turned mercenary Wade Wilson, who after being subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopts the alter ego Deadpool. Armed with his new abilities and a dark, twisted sense of humor, Deadpool hunts down the man who nearly destroyed his life.

results.title: La La Land
results.overview: Mia, an aspiring actress, serves lattes to movie stars in between auditions, and Sebastian, a jazz musician, scrapes by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, but as success mounts, they are faced with decisions that begin to fray the fragile fabric of their love affair, and the dreams they worked so hard to maintain in each other threaten to rip them apart.

results.title: Get Out
results.overview: Chris and his girlfriend Rose go upstate to visit her parents for the weekend. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behavior as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries lead him to a truth that he never could have imagined.

results.title: The Invisible Man (2020)
results.overview: Cecilia Kass seems to be free of her abusive ex-boyfriend. But then, he dies by suicide, and she starts to suspect that he may not be gone after all. When a series of strange occurrences plague her, Cecilia tries to convince people around her that she's being stalked by someone unseen. But as the events escalate, and as no one else believes her, Cecilia begins to question her own sanity and grasp on reality.

results.title: Palm Springs (2020)
results.overview: Nyles punctures the carefree vibe of a Palm Springs wedding when a chance encounter with Sarah turns into a time loop. Trapped reliving the same day over and over again, they develop a cynical understanding of their situation, but Nyles soon discovers there are limits to what they can do. Sarah, however, is determined to find a way to escape.

results.title: Tenet (2020)
results.overview: Armed with only a single word - Tenet - and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a nameless protagonist journeys through a dangerous world of espionage, international conflict, and reality-bending time manipulation.

results.title: Soul (2020)
results.overview: Joe Gardner, a middle-aged musician whose dreams of becoming a jazz pianist have been deferred for years, gets the chance of a lifetime to play at the Half Note Club. But one small misstep takes him from the streets of New York City to The Great Before - a fantastical realm where souls are prepared for Earth before they take human form. Determined to get back to his life, Joe teams up with 22, a rebellious soul who has never understood the appeal of living on Earth. Together, they embark on a remarkable journey that will challenge their very notions of life, death, and what it means to have a soul.

results.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once (2022)
results.overview: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure where she alone can save the world by connecting with parallel universes and existences.

results.title: Judas and the Black Messiah (2021)
results.overview: Fred Hampton, a charismatic leader who preached unity and empowerment, rose to become chairman of the Illinois Black Panther Party chapter. Threatened by his influence, the FBI orchestrated a secret deal with petty criminal William O'Neal to infiltrate the Black Panthers. O'Neal's actions would be the catalyst for a night of bloodshed that would change Fred Hampton's life, and the course of American history.

results.title: Dune (2021)
results.overview: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people. As malevolent forces explode into conflict over the planet's only valuable resource, a coveted spice with explosive power, Paul must confront his deepest fears and unlock his fate.

results.title: The Batman (2022)
results.overview: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption that connects to his own family's sordid past and must confront the Riddler, a sadistic serial killer who leaves behind cryptic puzzles as he targets Gotham City's elite.

results.title: Elvis (2022)
results.overview: The story of the King of Rock and Roll, Elvis Presley, from his early days as a charismatic singer to his ascent as a global icon and his struggle to stay relevant.
